articles.author: Gabriel Tan
articles.title: Malaysia strike at the death to down record champions Thailand in Southeast Asian Games opener - ESPN
articles.description: Malaysia are off to a winning start at the 2021 Southeast Asian Games after beating record 16-time gold medallists Thailand 2-1 in dramatic fashion.
articles.content: Malaysia have capitalised on a numerical advantage for the entire second half to come from behind and beat record 16-time gold medallists Thailand 2-1 in their opening Group B game at the 31st Southe… [+1909 chars]

articles.author: Ishika Mookerjee, John Cheng
articles.title: Where Should I Invest? Asean Stocks May See More Tailwinds - Bloomberg
articles.description: Fed hikes, decades-high inflation and Covid lockdowns in China are only adding to investor bets that Southeast Asia’s stock markets may be one of the best places to park their money right now.
articles.content:
